attributes.action: The Hunting Act 2004 be amended to permit the hunting of urban foxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: London is being overridden by foxes! Every night I am kept awake by the beasts screaming, fighting and copulating. Enough is enough! I propose that the Hunting Act be amended to allow teenagers on scooters to hunt them down with airguns and pitbulls.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
